alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Kershaw; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:32PM EDT until June 16 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Western Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 532 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mineral Springs to near Liberty Hill, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Pageland, Kershaw, Chesterfield, Elgin, Heath Springs, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, Mt Pisgah, Buford, Jefferson, Ruby, Mount Croghan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Arrowood Estates, Middendorf, Faith Christian School, Bear Creek Park and Central High School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
